queries.name: Default Query
queries.description: Show all events grouped by the origin host

queries.name: Log Type
queries.description: Show all events grouped by type

queries.name: Alerts
queries.description: Show all alerts grouped by alert source

queries.name: NIDS Alerts
queries.description: Show all NIDS alerts grouped by alert name
queries.query: event.category: network AND event.dataset: alert | groupby rule.name

queries.name: Wazuh/OSSEC Alerts
queries.description: Show all Wazuh alerts grouped by category

queries.name: Wazuh/OSSEC Commands
queries.description: Show all Wazuh alerts grouped by command line

queries.name: Wazuh/OSSEC Processes
queries.description: Show all Wazuh alerts grouped by process name

queries.name: Wazuh/OSSEC Users
queries.description: Show all Wazuh alerts grouped by username

queries.name: Sysmon Events
queries.description: Show all Sysmon logs grouped by event_id

queries.name: Sysmon Usernames
queries.description: Show all Sysmon logs grouped by username

queries.name: Zeek Notice
queries.query: event.module:zeek AND event.dataset:notice | groupby notice.note notice.message

queries.name: Connections
queries.description: Connections grouped by IP and Port
queries.query: event.module:zeek AND event.dataset:conn | groupby source.ip destination.ip network.protocol destination.port

queries.name: Connections
queries.query: event.module:zeek AND event.dataset:conn | groupby network.protocol destination.port

queries.name: DHCP
queries.query: event.module:zeek AND event.dataset:dhcp | groupby host.hostname host.domain dhcp.requested_address

queries.name: DNS
queries.query: event.module:zeek AND event.dataset:dns | groupby dns.query.name destination.port

queries.name: DNS
queries.query: event.module:zeek AND event.dataset:dns | groupby dns.query.type_name destination.port

queries.name: Files
queries.query: event.module:zeek AND event.dataset:files | groupby file.mime_type source.ip

queries.name: HTTP
queries.query: event.module:zeek AND event.dataset:http AND file.resp_mime_types:dosexec | groupby http.virtual_host

queries.name: Intel
queries.description: Intel framework hits grouped by indicator

queries.name: NOTICE
queries.description: Zeek notice logs grouped by note

queries.name: NOTICE
queries.description: Zeek notice logs grouped by message

queries.name: PE
queries.query: event.module:zeek AND event.dataset:pe | groupby file.machine file.os file.subsystem

queries.name: Signatures
queries.description: Zeek signatures grouped by signature id

queries.name: SNMP
queries.description: SNMP grouped by version and string
queries.query: event.module:zeek AND event.dataset:snmp | groupby snmp.community snmp.version

queries.name: Software
queries.description: List of software seen on the network
queries.query: event.module:zeek AND event.dataset:software | groupby software.type software.name

queries.name: SSL
queries.description: SSL grouped by version and server name
queries.query: event.module:zeek AND event.dataset:ssl | groupby ssl.version ssl.server_name

queries.name: SYSLOG
queries.description: SYSLOG grouped by severity and facility
queries.query: event.module:zeek AND event.dataset:syslog | groupby syslog.severity syslog.facility

queries.name: Weird
queries.description: Zeek weird log grouped by name
